name: 43 and Me
description:
The goal is to reach exactly 0. 

You can't go lower than 0.

You can't go higher than 43.

This is for Ludum Dare 43 with the theme "Sacrifices must be made". The sacrifices in this case are as abstract as it gets since I wanted to make something simple, intuitive and... well, something that I could do in under 48 hours.
